death.attack.createcybernetics.cyberware: %1$s’s body rejected their implants after %2$s caused critical failures.
death.attack.createcybernetics.heart_att: %1$s suffered a heart attack while being beaten by %2$s
death.attack.createcybernetics.liver_fai: %1$s's liver failed and they experienced multiple organ failure.
%1$s was slaughtered by %2$s while suffering from multiple organ failure.
death.attack.createcybernetics.missing_s: %1$s peeled off their skin and was tortured by %2$s.
death.attack.createcybernetics.missing_l: %1$s couldn't catch their breath while %2$s watched.
%1$s became an invertebrate and couldn't defend themselves against %2$s.
death.attack.createcybernetics.missing_m: %1$s reduced themselves to a pile of bones.
%1$s reduced themselves to a pile of bones and couldn't defend themselves against %2$s.
death.attack.createcybernetics.davids_de: %1$s pushed their body to it's limits with their sandevistan.
%1$s was torn apart by %2$s while trying to escape with their sandevistan.
tooltip.createcybernetics.eyeupgrades_hu: §1Adds a HUD to the user's vision
tooltip.createcybernetics.eyeupgrades_na: §1Adds a minimap to the user's vision
tooltip.createcybernetics.eyeupgrades_hu: §1Adds a HUD to the user's vision
tooltip.createcybernetics.eyeupgrades_zo: §1Allows the user to see distant objects
tooltip.createcybernetics.eyeupgrades_tr: §1Displays a projected trajectory for a held projectile
tooltip.createcybernetics.armupgrades_cr: §1Grants the user the ability to craft in a 3x3 grid without a Crafting Table
tooltip.createcybernetics.armupgrades_dr: §1Allows the user to mine anything without a tool (at the cost of a useable hand)
tooltip.createcybernetics.armupgrades_pn: §1Adds knockback to melee attacks and +2 Block Reach
tooltip.createcybernetics.armupgrades_re: §1Allows the user to mine stone level blocks without a tool
tooltip.createcybernetics.legupgrades_me: §1Can detect magnetic blocks up to 15 blocks below the user
tooltip.createcybernetics.legupgrades_an: §1Negates damage taken from falling up to 25 blocks when installed into both legs
tooltip.createcybernetics.legupgrades_ju: §1Allows the user to jump further and higher when sprinting or crouching
tooltip.createcybernetics.legupgrades_pr: §1Grants the user Dolphins Grace when swimming
tooltip.createcybernetics.legupgrades_sp: §1Increases the speed of creatures the user is riding
tooltip.createcybernetics.legupgrades_oc: §1Makes player footsteps and jumps silent if installed into both legs
tooltip.createcybernetics.boneupgrades_b: §1Negates damage taken from falling +3 blocks per stack
§1Adds 2 hearts of health to the user per stack
tooltip.createcybernetics.boneupgrades_e: §1An elytra fused to the user's spine
tooltip.createcybernetics.boneupgrades_p: §1Provides energy from movement at the risk of incurring occasional damage
tooltip.createcybernetics.boneupgrades_s: §1Allows the user to store and use up to 4 potions with extra duration
§1Grants the user immense speed for a short time
tooltip.createcybernetics.brainupgrades_: §1Grants the user 3x experience, and prevents insomnia for 6 days
§1Teleports the user out of the way of projectiles
§1Sends up to 14 experience levels to the user's new body when killed
§1Stores experience in a Capsule when the user is killed
§1Prevents Endermen from teleporting in a 10 block radius around the user
§1Highlights threats in a 25 block radius around the user
§1Automatically equips the required tool if it is in the user's inventory
§1Allows the user to remotely hack cybernetics
§1(InterDimensional Escape Module) Allows the user to escape to another dimension for 15 seconds
§1Allows the user to install Data Shards to upgrade basic skills
tooltip.createcybernetics.heartupgrades_: §1Generates energy from the beating of an organic heart
§1Provides ambient regeneration when the user is at rest
tooltip.createcybernetics.lungsupgrades_: §1Stores 1 extra minute of oxygen when the user is in breathable air
tooltip.createcybernetics.organsupgrades: §1Grants the user Speed and Strength when attacked
§1Generates energy from conflicting Redstone and Lapis wavelengths
§1Generates a large amount of energy from conflicting Redstone and Lapis wavelengths
tooltip.createcybernetics.organsupgrade_: §1Stores a large amount of energy from a Charging Block
tooltip.createcybernetics.skinupgrades_c: §1Allows the user to camoflauge perfectly in any environment
tooltip.createcybernetics.skinupgrades_i: §1Reduces Cybernetic rejection, but makes the user weak against negative status effects
tooltip.createcybernetics.skinupgrades_f: §1Allows the user to wear different faces to change the displayed username
tooltip.createcybernetics.skinupgrades_n: §1Grants the user immunity to fire and lava
tooltip.createcybernetics.skinupgrades_s: §1Generates energy when the user is in sunlight
§1Allows the user to climb walls like a spider
§1Releases large amounts of sweat to release heat
tooltip.createcybernetics.wetware_firebr: §cAllows the user to shoot Dragon Fireballs
tooltip.createcybernetics.wetware_guardi: §cAllows the user to shoot Guardian Lasers
tooltip.createcybernetics.wetware_ravage: §cProvides strength and durability to the user
tooltip.createcybernetics.wetware_sculkl: §cAllows the user to emit a sonic shriek attack
tooltip.createcybernetics.wetware_grassf: §cUser gains the ability to eat grass and wheat
tooltip.createcybernetics.wetware_spinne: §cUser gains the ability to shoot webbing to ensnare prey
